Class G2View

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(G2Player robot,
                   java.util.ArrayList<Animal> animalList,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> objectiveList,
                   long timeRemaining,
                   double econScore,
                   double envirmScore,
                   double overallScore)
        draws the game score, check which animals where found, and calls the drawAndFlip for Robot, and checks all the animal states and changes them respectively Created on
        Parameters:
        robot - G2Player, the Robot you controll for G2
        animalList - ArrayList<Animal>, the List of animal we got in this game
        objectiveList - ArrayList<String>, list of Strings with the objectives
        timeRemaining - long, the current Time which we have left
        econScore - double, Econ score which we want to display
        envirmScore - double, Envirm score which we want to display
        overallScore - double, Overall score which we want to display
